      • getArchiveSummaries

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<ArchiveSummary>> getArchiveSummaries(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> repositoryIds)
        Get a map of summaries from different repositories.
        Parameters:
        repositoryIds - ids for repositories to query. if empty, then all repositories will be queried.
        Returns:
        map of repository id to list of summaries in the respective repository
